about_the_game:
The demo version of "Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road" is on the horizon!

Not only can you enjoy single-player matches in "Compete Against Bots," but you can also face off against friends and players from all over the world in "Online Match" or dive into "Story Mode"
to experience the beginning of a new adventure!

But that's not all! Train your players for the competition and get ready for the heated preliminary matches to begin!
detailed_description:
The demo version of "Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road" is on the horizon!

Not only can you enjoy single-player matches in "Compete Against Bots," but you can also face off against friends and players from all over the world in "Online Match" or dive into "Story Mode"
to experience the beginning of a new adventure!

But that's not all! Train your players for the competition and get ready for the heated preliminary matches to begin!
name: INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road Worldwide Beta Test Demo "Leave Your Inazuma Mark on the World!"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 / AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650Ti / Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device

short_description: The Beta Test Demo for the latest entry in the character collection and football simulation RPG series, "Inazuma Eleven," is now available! Enjoy hyperdimensional football matches packed with Special Moves, and experience an all-new story set twenty-five years after the original "Inazuma Eleven"!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
